attributes.additional_details:
He has a great track record, he is honest, he is entertaining, he has a farm in Cornwall.

He can't get a look in at the big clubs, he never will, because they are all foreign owned!

He is a credit to England, a good bloke who lives in the real world.

Sod the lack of international experience, win or lose, so what, the point is, England would be England again, playing good, honest, attacking football.
